column5: Talk about a growth spurt check out the size of some of these Salmon, they are a head of last year, watch Mar 11-12 Hillcrest, these automatic feeders look like they are working lol Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhat...s.blogspot.com/
Cool videos! Thanks for sharing!  My daughters grade 3 class did that last year. It's a great program. It really gets the kids engaged!  Here's my report from last year: Atlantic Salmon Field Trip
Great Program Homer, Spread the word & Spread the Program Tight Lines SBK
